comment.body: 3 pairs trouvés mais pas d'accès au site ;)

Hi ! I didn't tried anythin' with a Raspberry Pi 3 but I'd like to know some specifications: router brand, network speed ... Because I'm interested :D  My Pi has Berryboot and the system is installed on a 2,5" HDD and I also installed others OS: ubuntu mate, q4os, Libreelec, Raspbian ;)

I'm from France and we saw (just 20 seconds) police intervention on TV news. French government is afraid about it, because it doesn't want French people do that.. However, in France, the problem is not about some regions but about non-sense laws.
